group_1.textRight: What is it?

group_1.textLeft: The story of the magpie bringing Tsuyu and@Chizuru together is true, right?

group_1.textRight: Yes, that's correct.

group_1.textLeft: Then is it really okay to leave things like this…?

group_1.textRight: It's a difficult problem.
We've entered the past, and in doing so@caused no major changes in the future.
I think it proves that even with small@discrepancies, history repairs itself.
But this issue between Tsuyu and Chizuru@is very critical.
We should work under the premise that@this may cause a time paradox.

group_1.textLeft: This is also straying from what Iroha recorded…

group_1.textRight: Once the distortion is beyond repair,@she may fade from existence entirely.
Pwah?!
What is Miss Mighty planning to do…?

group_1.textLeft: We just have to become the magpie that@connects them!
In other words, we'll be the cupid that brings@them together!!

group_1.textRight: Another one of your outlandish ideas…
But I think it's a good plan!
As a cupid, I'll help the two meet…
If we ask them to see each other,@they'll probably both refuse…

group_1.textLeft: We'll just plan an accidental encounter@on the battlefield.

group_1.textRight: But if one of them dies, history is irreversible…
…How are you sure?

group_1.textLeft: Even in this war-torn land, Princess Tsuyu@has never killed anyone.

group_1.textRight: She even said earlier that she doesn't want@Chizuru to die!

group_1.textLeft: Even the farmers who attacked the sacred@tree only suffered minor injuries.
No, wait… If Chizuru tries to kill her…

group_1.textRight: I don't think we need to worry about@that either…
When Chizuru came to us, she was all alone@without any allies…
She could have launched a surprise attack,@but she spoke to us normally.
I think she was just concerned about@Princess Tsuyu…
That's just what I think, although the situation@might change with this battle…
Maybe it's just wishful thinking…

group_1.textLeft: I don't think they'd kill each other.
If we do nothing their relationship might@become irreparable.
Here's to hoping something will happen@that will bring them together!

group_1.textRight: I hope so too…!

group_1.textLeft: Let's do it then!@We'll join the Taito Gang attack!

group_1.textCenter: Kumai has given the signal!@Archers, scour the forest for the enemy!
The rear ranks will strike down any enemy@that flees!
